data.text: Elifasi nun Bilidada nun Sofara yi ba falan tiyɛ Yuba xa, bayo a yi a yɛtɛ mirixi tinxinden nan na.
Nayi, Elihu yi xɔlɔ, Busi kaan Barakɛli a dii xɛmɛn naxan Rami xabilani. A xɔlɔ Yuba xili ma, amasɔtɔ a yi a falama nɛn a a tinxin Ala yɛtagi.
A mɔn yi xɔlɔ xɛmɛ saxanne ma, bayo e mi yabi faɲin sɔtɔxi Yuba ra, na feen yi lu alo Ala nan findixi fe kalan na.
Bayo e yi fori a xa, Elihu yi a sabari, a munma yi falan ti Yuba xa.
Koni Elihu to a to yabi mi yi fa xɛmɛ saxanna ne dɛ, a yi xɔlɔ.
Nayi, Elihu, Busi kaan Barakɛli a dii xɛmɛn yi falan ti, a naxa,
N yi a mirixi nɛn, n naxa,
Koni ɲɔndin naxan na,
Siimayaan xa mi tun fama fekolonna ra,
Nanara, n na a falama, n naxa,
“Han iki, n bata ɛ falane ramɛ,
N na n tuli matixi nɛn ɛ ra ki faɲi,
Ɛ nama a fala, ɛ naxa,
Yuba mi a falane tixi n tan xan xili ma,
“Yuba, i lanfane bata tunnaxɔlɔ e ma,
N mɔn xa lu sabarixi ba,
N fan waxi n ma yabin ti feni.
bayo fala gbegbe n kui,
na bata n bɔɲɛn nate,
N xa falan ti, nanara a godɛ,
N mi muxu yo rafisama a bode xa.
A yɛtɛna, n mi fatan muxu matɔxɛ,
